pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Lloyd Bochner Collection of Scripts for Television
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists primarily of television scripts related to Bochner's acting career but also contains scripts for several radio programs, including CBS Radio Mystery Theater, Mutual Radio Theater: The Adventure Show, Mutual Radio Theater: The Love Show, Sears Radio Theater and Sears Radio Theater: The Adventure Show.
